Package io.codefine.onequery

Interface OneQueryCommonTableStep<R extends org.jooq.Record>

All Known Subinterfaces:
OneQueryCollectStep<R>, OneQueryFieldsStep<R>, OneQueryFilterStep<R>, OneQueryOptionalPaginationStep<R>, OneQueryPaginationResultStep<R>, OneQuerySortStep<R>
All Known Implementing Classes:
OneQuery
public interface OneQueryCommonTableStep<R extends org.jooq.Record>
An interface that helps create a CTE, which can contain filtering, pagination, and sorting

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Long
    getTotal()
    Returns the total number of locations after calling OneQueryPaginationStep.paginate(io.codefine.onequery.model.Page), if OneQueryPaginationStep.paginate(io.codefine.onequery.model.Page) was not called, it will return null
    @NotNull org.jooq.CommonTableExpression<R>
    toCommonTable(String name)
    A method that returns a CTE with the specified name

    • getTotal

      Long getTotal()
      Returns the total number of locations after calling OneQueryPaginationStep.paginate(io.codefine.onequery.model.Page), if OneQueryPaginationStep.paginate(io.codefine.onequery.model.Page) was not called, it will return null
